properties.name: ball.event.publisher.type
properties.description: Type of event publisher to use (inmemory, kafka, redis, etc.)

properties.name: ball.event.publisher.inmemory.enable-retry
properties.description: Whether to enable retry mechanism for failed event publishing.

properties.name: ball.event.publisher.inmemory.max-retry-attempts
properties.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed events.

properties.name: ball.event.publisher.inmemory.retry-delay-ms
properties.description: Delay between retry attempts in milliseconds.

properties.name: ball.event.publisher.inmemory.timeout-ms
properties.description: Event publishing timeout in milliseconds. 0 means no timeout.

properties.name: ball.event.publisher.inmemory.enable-debug-logging
properties.description: Whether to enable debug logging for event publishing.
